nhc_headline: ...SYSTEM FORECAST TO CAUSE HEAVY RAINS AND COASTAL FLOODING  IN NORTHEASTERN MEXICO AND TEXAS BEGINNING ON TUESDAY...
summary:
...SYSTEM FORECAST TO CAUSE HEAVY RAINS AND COASTAL FLOODING  IN NORTHEASTERN MEXICO AND TEXAS BEGINNING ON TUESDAY...
 As of 7:00 PM CDT Mon Jun 17
 the center of One was located near 20.5, -93.0
 with movement NNW at 7 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 999 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.
